name: Garden of the Gods (Jardim dos Deuses)
description:
I made "Jardim dos Deuses" under heavy influence of 2020s quarantine. Living in the city and staying inside with my family was really driving me mad (it's always been a thing for me, even before corona), so the solution I found was to run towards nature as much as I could. Traveling and hiking to know new places and being in silence had a curing effect on my body and soul. I could finally think straight. This painting is about being a ghost withing the forest, inconspicuous to others but myself and nature. Empty, traveling light, shining, relaxed and back to Gaia again. Some weed and mushrooms were involved too.
 
Made with:

- 300gsm watercolor paper
- Watercolor
- Nankin pen
